name: FinistÃ¨re Business Angels
overview:
Finistere Partners is a venture capital and fund management firm with a unique international focus. They recognize that innovation is as likely to occur in Sydney as it is San Diego; as likely in New Zealand as New York. Yet the traditional venture capital fund has found it difficult to look outside its region.

Investment in agricultural biotechnology and agritech in New Zealand and Australia is an area of prime interest to them. A close association with their sister fund, Finistere Ventures, a life science venture capital firm based in San Diego provides access to markets in the United States. Finistere welcomes interest from professional investors and entrepreneurs, seeking superior returns in their industries of focus.
